name: OVizier
description:
Game made for MiniJam 61: Ancient Egypt

Limitation: Game must have Two Conflicting Themes

Explanation: Themes of Corruption and Honesty

Who do you call when the Nobles of the Nile, the Scribes of the Sands, and the Slaves of the Sun God want to be released from prison?

You are the Grand Vizier of Ancient Egypt, top judge of the valley. With 25 weeks left till you finish your post, you must keep each of the factions happy, lest the unhappy plot your quick demise...

Controls

Choose one of each options for each person in jail. One option for each, you can't kill (or release) them all.

Crimes commited are displayed below the potraits of the prisoners.
